colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (SMRAS PA, ,SNYIGS MA'I BRLANG SPYOD MUN NAG GIS BOS PA'I, ,MA RUNGS LOG 'DREN SRIN BYA STONG GI DPUNG, ,TSAR GCOD BYIN RLABS NYI MA 'ONG PO CHE DGE LEGS PAD BZHAD PA'I GNYER GNYEN 'DI RMAD, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB SKYER SGANG LUGS KYI BYIN RLABS BYED TSUL YE SHES RDO RJE'I GUR KHANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI PI LIG THU GU SHRI BSAM 'GRUB NYI MA'I 'DOD MOS LTAR BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MAS BRIS PA'O, ,)
